html:
At that time. The events in this section occur after Hezekiah recovers from his illness (Isa. 38).

Merodach-baladan. Merodach-baladan conquered Babylon in 703 b.c. In an effort to solicit Hezekiah's support against Assyria, he sent letters, a gift, and then a delegation to Hezekiah, using Hezekiah's recovery as an excuse for a visit.
